Package it.polimi.ingsw.View.StorageOfModelInformation

Class ModelStorage

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.StorageOfModelInformation.ModelStorage
public class ModelStorage extends Object
A reduced version of the model used to contain all useful information about the game in a light way. Used by the drawers, useful to do information hiding.

  • Constructor Details

    • ModelStorage

      public ModelStorage(int numberOfPlayers, boolean expertMode)
      ModelStorage constructor.
      Parameters:
      numberOfPlayers - number of player that are playing the game we want to store the data.
      expertMode - game mode of the game we want to store the data.

  • Method Details

    • setupStorage

      public void setupStorage(GameCreation_UpdateMsg message)
      Sets up the storage for the first time when a game starts.
      Parameters:
      message - a GameCreation_UpdateMsg that contains all the useful data about the game (dashboards and game table with all their objects).

      playerID - ID of the player that will have his entrance updated.
      students - updated students on the entrance of the player.

    • updateDiscardPile

      public void updateDiscardPile(int playerID, int turnOrder, int mnMovement)
      Updates the discard pile of a player.
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that will have his discard pile changed.
      turnOrder - turn order of the updated assistant card on the discard pile.
      mnMovement - mother nature movement of the updated assistant card on the discard pile.

    • updateAssistantsCard

      public void updateAssistantsCard(int playerID, ArrayList<Integer> assistantCardsTurnOrder, ArrayList<Integer> assistantCardsMNMovement)

      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the player that will have his deck of assistant cards changed.
      assistantCardsTurnOrder - turn orders of the updated deck of assistant cards.
      assistantCardsMNMovement - mother nature movements of the updated deck of assistant cards.

      public void updateCharacterCard(int characterCardIndex, int cost, HashMap<RealmColors,Integer> characterCardsStudents, int denyCards)
      Updates a character card.
      Parameters:
      characterCardIndex - index of the character card.
      cost - updated cost of the character card.
      characterCardsStudents - updated students on the character card.
      denyCards - updated quantity of deny cards on the character card.

    • updateIsles

      public void updateIsles(MNMovement_UpdateMsg mnm)

      Parameters:
      mnm - message containing the information about the movement of mother nature and the current state of the isles.

    • updateIsles

      public void updateIsles(EffectActivation_UpdateMsg ea)
      Updates all the isles after mother nature has been moved.
      Parameters:
      ea - message containing the information about the activation of a character card that altered the state of the isles and their current state.
